Uses of Package
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service

  • Packages that use com.fasterxml.clustermate.service 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.dw
    Package that contains basic components needed to run a ClusterMate-based service on DropWizard container.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.jaxrs
    Package that contains glue code between "native" interface storage system exposes, and JAX-RS container itself: mostly just resource end points.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service
    Package contains basic building that are useful for building actual services around StoreMate store implementation.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.bdb
    Package that contains BDB-JE based implementations of metadata stores ClusterMate needs.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cleanup  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.metrics  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.servlet  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store
    Package that contains functionality that implements access to the actual distributed data store.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.sync  
  • Classes in com.fasterxml.clustermate.service used by com.fasterxml.clustermate.dw 
    Class and Description
    SharedServiceStuff
    Since we need to pass lots of shared helper objects this class is used to collect them in one place to make passing of things bit easier.
    StartAndStoppable
    Simple tag interface, to denote Managed things but encapsulate details on interaction with the service.
    Stores
    Basic abstraction used for handling references to core stores that a clustered service needs.
  • Classes in com.fasterxml.clustermate.service used by com.fasterxml.clustermate.jaxrs 
    Class and Description
    OperationDiagnostics
    Helper class used for requesting and returning per-operation statistics so that caller can update metrics and diagnostic information
    ServiceRequest
    Interface class that defines abstraction implemented by classes that enclose details of a (HTTP) request that server receives.
    ServiceResponse
    Interface class that defines interface of (HTTP) Responses server returns to caller.
    SharedServiceStuff
    Since we need to pass lots of shared helper objects this class is used to collect them in one place to make passing of things bit easier.
    Stores
    Basic abstraction used for handling references to core stores that a clustered service needs.
  • Classes in com.fasterxml.clustermate.service used by com.fasterxml.clustermate.service 
    Class and Description
    LastAccessStore
    Class that encapsulates optional storage of last-accessed information, which implementations may choose to use for things like dynamic expiration of not-recently-accessed entries.
    LastAccessStore.LastAccessIterationCallback
    Callback for safe traversal over last-accessed entries; mostly needed for clean up or statistics gathering operations.
    LastAccessUpdateMethod
    Interface that defines abstraction used for storing optional information about last-access time for entries, for purpose of defining life-time of an entry in terms of last-access, instead of creation time.
    NodeStateStore
    Base class that defines operations for storing and retrieving persistent Node state information.
    OperationDiagnostics
    Helper class used for requesting and returning per-operation statistics so that caller can update metrics and diagnostic information
    ServiceRequest
    Interface class that defines abstraction implemented by classes that enclose details of a (HTTP) request that server receives.
    ServiceResponse
    Interface class that defines interface of (HTTP) Responses server returns to caller.
    StartAndStoppable
    Simple tag interface, to denote Managed things but encapsulate details on interaction with the service.
